question: Which state has recently included the Department of Agriculture under Mo Sarkar?
explanation: The Odisha State Government included the Department of Agriculture & Farmers\' Empowerment under the state\'s Mo Sarkar programme. It was announced by the Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik. Under this, the Chief Minister would personally call up the farmers and take their feedback on the services that are provided by the department. Action will be taken on the employees of the department if the Government receives negative feedback from the farmers. The move aims at meeting farmers\' expectations and effectively providing services to them.
